sentences.sContent: Meanwhile the conductor lifted his violin bow and the orchestra attacked the overture .
sentences.sContent_eng: Meanwhile the conductor lifted his violin bow and the orchestra attacked the overture .
sentences.sCn: 这时，乐队指挥把小提琴的弓子一举，乐队就奏起序曲来。

remMethod.val: o(出) + ver(覆盖) + ture → 去掉覆盖物， 打开 → 序曲

trans.tranOther: a short piece of music written as an introduction to a long piece of music, especially an opera
